description: leveldb: rewrite memfs_test's TestBasics as a table-driven test.

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6446099/diff/4001/leveldb/memfs/memfs_test.go#newcode29
leveldb/memfs/memfs_test.go:29: "1a: create /foo",
the "1a", "2a", etc. prefixes probably don't matter so much any more. If there's so much going on here that it would help, it would probably be even more useful to t.Log the whole name every time.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/leveldb-go/source/detail?r=e52508b8dc6d ***
